text: Two Moon Junction is a 1988 melodrama and erotic romance-thriller movie. The movie is about events happening in the Southern United States. Sherilyn Fenn plays April. Louise Fletcher plays Belle. Milla Jovovich plays Samantha. This was Milla Jovovich's first movie. This movie was filmed around Los Angeles. Category:1980s thriller movies Category:1980s drama movies Category:1988 movies Category:American independent movies
title: Two Moon Junction
